description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fjbt5","text":"Our protocol for producing recombinant DNA via Gibson Assembly, based on a home-made Gibson Master Mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_materials.name: Deoxynucleotide Solution Set - 25 umol of each

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2vlia","text":"Mix the following to give 1 ml of 5x Isothermal Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"212u","text":"450 μl 50% PEG 8000","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dp9l1","text":"250 μl 2M Tris-HCl pH 7.5","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6u5l4","text":"100 μl 500 mM MgCl2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":18,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr13a","text":"50 μl 1M DTT","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o3h6","text":"100 μl 50 mM NAD","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"390j3","text":"10 μl each of 100 mM ATP, CTP, GTP and TTP (PCR grade)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt353","text":"10 μl sterile water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3b0j","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ca6j5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"can_edit":1,"cas_number":"","guid":"41068878341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","in_steps":null,"linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Deoxynucleotide Solution Set - 25 umol of each","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"N0446S","url":"https://www.neb.com/N0446","vendor":{"id":2,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/2.png","source":"/img/vendors/2.png"},"link":"https://www.neb.com/","name":"New England Biolabs"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejori","text":"Mix the following reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5onfg","text":"160 μl of 5x Isothermal Buffer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2a4a7","text":"3.2 μl of 1U/μl T5 exonuclease (diluted 1:10 in water from the 10 U/μl stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"98uge","text":"10 μl of 2U/μl Phusion polymerase","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5l4c6","text":"80 μl of 40 U/μl Taq ligase","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fmd4e","text":"346.8 μl deionised water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"els53","text":"Freeze in 15 μl aliquots (one 15 μl aliquot is ready-to-use for one Gibson assembly reaction)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"36rjn","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5j9v4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"75tb3","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"_public":"","guid":"41022CE5341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":"","name":"Taq DNA Ligase - 2,000 units","reagent_vendor_link":"https://www.neb.com/","sku":"M0208S","url":"https://www.neb.com/M0208","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"badges":[],"id":2,"image":{"placeholder":"https://stage.protocols.io/img/vendors/2.png","source":"https://stage.protocols.io/img/vendors/2.png"},"link":"https://www.neb.com/","name":"New England Biolabs","username":null}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"_public":"","guid":"41025372341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":"","name":"T5 Exonuclease - 1,000 units","reagent_vendor_link":"https://www.neb.com/","sku":"M0363S","url":"https://www.neb.com/M0363","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"badges":[],"id":2,"image":{"placeholder":"https://stage.protocols.io/img/vendors/2.png","source":"https://stage.protocols.io/img/vendors/2.png"},"link":"https://www.neb.com/","name":"New England Biolabs","username":null}}},"2":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"_public":"","guid":"410638DA341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":"","name":"Phusion DNA polymerase","reagent_vendor_link":"https://www.neb.com/","sku":"","url":"","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"badges":[],"id":2,"image":{"placeholder":"https://stage.protocols.io/img/vendors/2.png","source":"https://stage.protocols.io/img/vendors/2.png"},"link":"https://www.neb.com/","name":"New England Biolabs","username":null}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5bfjt","text":"Preparation: You need to have prepared two or more fragments of DNA which you wish to recombine, and which have 25-40 nucleotide homologous regions at their ends. For example, this could be a linearised vector and a PCR product which has sequences corresponding tot he ends of the linearised vector introduced via the primers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"o7ks","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9u02q","text":"Mix the fragments to be assembled in equimolar ratios in a total volume of 5 μl. Add this mixture to one 15 μl aliquot of Gibson Master Mix.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2lj7m","text":"Incubate the reaction in a 50°C water bath or in a PCR machine at 50°C  for one hour.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"pjp5","text":"Use 2-10 μl of the assembly reaction for a bacterial transformation.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Recombining DNA by Gibson Assembly
